testcase.classname: Test the functionality of Home page
testcase.name: Verify the contents of ATM services
testcase.system-out: Given User launches the application.........................................passed When user clicks on Home page option........................................passed Then user is directed to Home page.........................................passed When user is able to view ATM services......................................passed And User is able to view Withdrawal funds, Transfer funds, check balances, make deposits of Online services.passed Then All the contents of ATM services are present...........................passed

testcase.name: Verify the clicking of search field in products page
testcase.system-out: Given User launches the application.........................................passed When user clicks on products option.........................................passed And User views and clicks on search field...................................passed Then Search button is clickable.............................................passed

testcase.name: Verify data entry in search field of products page
testcase.system-out: Given User launches the application.........................................passed When user clicks on products option.........................................passed And User views and clicks on search field...................................passed And user enters text into the search box and clicks enter...................passed Then search field is valid..................................................passed

testcase.classname: Test the functionality of products page
testcase.name: Verify dropdown of Solutions in products page
testcase.system-out: Given User launches the application.........................................passed When user clicks on products option.........................................passed And clicks on solution......................................................passed And selects a drop down option..............................................passed Then dropdown is working fine...............................................passed

testcase.classname: Test the functionality of products page
testcase.name: Verify selecting the language in Products page
testcase.system-out: Given User launches the application.........................................passed When user clicks on products option.........................................passed And user clicks on Language dropdown........................................passed And user selects on English language........................................passed Then the language of page is changed to english.............................passed
